ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH

TITLE.P: 81223811 — Advisory services for Sustainable Urban Development in selected Smart Cities in India

SHORT_DESCR.P: The German federal ministry for economic cooperation and development (BMZ) has commissioned us to implement the above project. The overall objective of the project Sustainable urban development — Smart Cities (SUD-SC) is: "Responsible national, state and municipal institutions have applied concepts for sustainable urban development with regard to the provision of urban basic services and housing in selected smart cities". Implementation will initially focus on the states of Kerala, Tamil Nadu and Odisha, and the Smart Cities of Kochi, Coimbatore and Bhubaneswar. The project is clustered into 5 intervention areas, namely (1) national orientation framework for sustainable urban development and basic urban services, (2) national orientation framework for pro-poor housing provision, (3) state level framework for the steering and implementation of sustainable urban development, (4) integrated urban development in Smart Cities, and (5) provision of housing and basic municipal services.

A Firm of consultants (FoC) is required to provide international and Indian experts with relevant professional and regional experience. The FoC shall assume overall responsibility for the implementation of intervention area (5) at city level and for providing limited support to intervention areas (3) and (4) at state level. The primary focus will be on pro-poor housing development and basic municipal service delivery related to water supply, wastewater management and sanitation, urban drainage and solid waste management. In addition, support related to training measures and the introduction of integrated urban planning procedures will be required. The FoC shall cooperate activities closely with the GIZ project team.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: It is expected that BMZ will provide additional funding in 2018 and 2019 for up-scaling and extension of this project. Provided that this will materialize the FoC is expected to submit proposals for the extension of the consulting services on request of GIZ.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: Average annual turnover for the last 3 financial years (last-but-four financial year can be included in case ofinvitation to tender held within 6 months of end of last financial year).

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: 1) Number of employees as at 31.12. of the previous year
2) Technical assessment is only based on reference projects, reference projects in the technical field

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: 1) Number of employees as at 31.12. of the previous year, at least: 30
2) The technical assessment is only based on reference projects with a minimum commission value of 500 000 EUR, in the last 3 years:
— At least 5 reference projects in the technical field of Energy efficiency in buildings,
— At least 3 reference projects in the country India.

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: According to Article 160, Section 3 of the German Act Against Restraint of Competition, application for reexamination is not permissible insofar as.

1. the applicant has identified the claimed infringement of the contract award regulations before submitting the application for re-examination and has not submitted a complaint to the commissioning party within a period of 10 calendar days; the expiry of the period pursuant to Article 134, Section 2 remains unaffected,

2. complaints of infringements of contract award regulations that are evident in the notice are not submitted to the commissioning party at the latest by the expiry of the deadline for the application specified in the notice or by the deadline for the submission of bids,

3. complaints of infringements of contract award regulations that first become evident in the tender documents are not submitted to the commissioning party at the latest by the expiry of the deadline for application or for the submission of bids,
4. more than 15 calendar days have elapsed after receipt of the notification from the commissioning party that it is unwilling to readress the complaint.
